skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: War Altar of Sigmar
skillTree.description: The altar prominently features a noble griffon bearing Ghal Maraz, Sigmar’s hammer and the emblem of Imperial unity and strength.

effects.description: Mount: War Altar of Sigmar

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%
Passive ability: "Hold the Line!"

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.name: Grand Hammer of Sigmar
skillTree.description: The Warrior Priest implores Sigmar to imbue him with a modicum of divine strength, and now his hammer glows bright with power!

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Grand Hammer of Sigmar"

skillTree.name: Grand Shield of Faith
skillTree.description: The Warrior Priest’s faith manifests in the form of a shield as hard as castle-forged steel.

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Grand Shield of Faith"

skillTree.name: Grand Soulfire
skillTree.description: A battle prayer that bathes the Warrior Priest in white, holy fire sears Sigmar’s foes but leaves the supplicant unharmed.

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Grand Soulfire"

skillTree.name: Second Nature
skillTree.description: Practice makes the perfect warrior; when battle is instinctive as drawing breath, exalted status is achieved.

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to battle prayers

skillTree.name: Mere Mortal Men!
skillTree.description: "But can all the horrors of the world kill these mere mortals?"

skillTree.description: Those who have sacrificed all to do the gods’ work enjoy more than a modicum of their protection.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade

Ability: "Faith's Bastion"

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6

factionEffects.title: Cult of Sigmar
factionEffects.description: Volkmar the Grim is the head of the Cult of Sigmar and the most powerful religious leader in the Empire. He is a pious and foreboding man, utterly devoted to the destruction of Chaos in all its forms.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to battle prayers and "Accusation"
